DOC.brief_title: Foster With Without Charcoal Block Aerochamber Plus
DOC.criteria: Sex : male 18≤age≤45 year old BMI : 18≤BMI≤28 kg/m2 Nonsmokers Vital sign : SBP 100139 mmHg , DBP 5089 , HR 5090 bpm , measure 5 min rest sit position Full comprehension : ability use correctly pMDI preparation ; ability comprehend full nature purpose study , include possible risk side effect ; ability cooperate Investigator comply requirement entire study Informed Consent : sign write informed consent prior inclusion study . ECG ( 12 lead ) : clinically relevant abnormality and/or QTc > 450 msec ; Physical finding : clinically relevant abnormal physical finding , could interfere objective study ; particular abnormality lung functionality : FEV1 < 80 % predict value accord European Respiratory Society base upon Quanjer et al . ( 25 ) Laboratory analysis : clinically relevant abnormal laboratory value indicative physical illness ; particular positive HIV1 HIV2 serology and/or positive hepatitis serology indicate acute chronic hepatitis B C Allergy : ascertain presumptive hypersensitivity active principle and/or formulation ' ingredient ; history anaphylaxis drug allergic reaction general , Investigator considers may affect outcome study Diseases : relevant history renal , hepatic , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , respiratory , skin , haematological , endocrine neurological disease , may interfere aim study Medications : medication , include OTC , 2 week start study . Any known enzyme induce drug enzyme inhibitor must stop least 2 month study start Investigative drug trial : participation evaluation drug within 3 month prior screen Blood donation : blood donation 3 month prior study Drug , alcohol , caffeine , tobacco : history drug , alcohol [ > 2 drinks/day , define accord USDA Dietary Guidelines 2005 ( 26 ) ] , caffeine ( > 5 cup coffee/tea/day ) abuse smoke Abnormal diet ( < 1600 > 3500 kcal/day ) substantial change eat habit within past 4 week .
